EmailTemplate.name: AGG_ET27_PSA_Relieve Coordinator Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Change of Aggregate Report Coordinator Assignment
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The Coordinator listed on Aggregate Report: {!Aggregate_Report__c.Name} has changed.
The new Coordinator is: {!Aggregate_Report__c.Coordinator__c}.
Please contact your line manager if you have any questions.
Thank You
